thread.title: Standby Now for 27 Years - Review
thread.title_full: Standby Now for 27 Years - Review of Lenox Montparnasse, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jml3
title: Standby Now for 27 Years - Review
text: I have been staying at the Lenox during most of my relatively frequent trips to Paris since 1989. Obviously, I think highly of the service, quality of accommodation, location, and the sense of familiarity. The hotel if anything has not only maintained but indeed improved its quality over these almost three decades. I will be back in October, and the room is already booked.
